I Am Joe Doe The

I specialize in graphic design, UI/UX and photography

Vew My Work

I Specialize In

Photography as well as creating digital masterpieces and UI/UX layouts for websites and mobile applications

Concepting

Tapping into real consumer beliefs that provide a relevant context for the product idea. Focusing on the benefits a buyer will receive or feel through experiencing the product offering.

UI/UX

Creating and applying design strategies across branding and product design. Refining design directions and finalizing design details. Leading the planning and structuring of deliverables.

Visual Design

Leading the design, paired with the development portal, to deliver content. Creating functional prototypes alongside various web and client side components.

Interaction

Working on animations and the integration design of UI elements for apps and large installation touch screen. Experimented with animations and prototypes to bring a more playful and intuitive experience to the product.

My Creative Process

Usually is divided into 4 stages.

1

Discuss the Project

Book a time slot with me to discuss your idea and your preferences. Communication is the key to successful project.

2

Brainstorming ^ Concept

Give me some time to proceed with ideas and I get back to you with conceptions. We will exchange ideas and choose the best one!

3

UI/UX Planning

Not a less of an important stage. I use best practices to make your project most user-friendly creating your recognizable style.

4

Interaction

Receive the result and see how it works!
